name: Working
description: Dogs bred for tasks such as guarding property, pulling sleds, and performing water rescues.

name: Herding
description: Dogs bred to gather, herd, and protect livestock such as sheep, cattle, and reindeer.

name: Sporting
description: Dogs bred to assist hunters in finding and retrieving game.

name: Terrier
description: Dogs bred to hunt and kill vermin.

name: Companion
description: Dogs specifically bred for human companionship and emotional support.

name: Designer
description: Dogs that are crossbreeds of two or more established breeds, typically with specific traits.

name: Spitz-type
description: Dogs characterized by thick fur, pointed ears and muzzles, and often a tail that curls over the back.

name: Guardian
description: Dogs bred to protect livestock and property.

name: Scent
description: Dogs bred to track and locate scents.

name: Sighthounds & Pariahs
description: Dogs bred to hunt by sight or scent.
